concept.title: Event Builder
concept.abstract:
The Event Builder allows staff users to create both simple and conference style events, greatly speeding up the process of event creation in a unified interface.
Navigate to the Events tab and click the New button to launch the Event Selector modal and the Event Form.
Enter the Registration Style, the Event Category, and the Event Name. The values in the Event Category and the Preview image are determined by the Registration Style. The available Options are determined by the Event Category.
Click Cancel to close the Event Selector modal and return to the Event record. Clicking Save & Continue will save the Event record with the current date, hide the modal, and direct users to the Event Form.
When using the Event Builder to create simple events, staff users can:
Create a Default Simple Event event category that is automatically published on the default Site.
Create a Default Ticket Type of $0.00 on the Default Simple Event.
Enter event and venue details, as well as images, from a unified interface by creating a form using the Lightning Design Components.
Check the 24-hour Time checkbox to toggle the Start Date and End Date time-date fields between 12-hour and 24-hour time fields; date fields and Duration will not change.
Preview the event directly from the form on different Sites.
Create the Event, Venue, and Ticket Type records upon clicking Submit.
Upload any files to an automatically created Media Collection upon clicking Submit.

conbody.p: Click the Save button to save the form and create the related records without closing the Event Form. Click the Close & Save button to save all records and close the Event Form; the user is returned to the Event record.
After a simple event has been created:

ul.li: Navigate to the Event record and check the Is Published checkbox to publish the Event.The Event Builder cannot be used to edit an existing event; it is only for creating new events.
